page.title: 01THE AREA
page.content: This region is located about 3 miles from the coast.To the north the Limestone scenery of the {Mendip Hills can be found.To the south-west are the {Quantock Hills }and further west the New red sandstone scenery of {Exmoor.}Most of our region is low lying and is part of the {Somerset {levels.} The two villages of {Puriton }and { {Woolavington }are the dominant settlements in the region. During the course of this survey we shall we outlining a number of items which reflect life in this rural setting,as well it's history and it's recent development.The material contained in this survey has been collected by the primary schools in the two villages.Thanks must be given to all those who have contributed.
